post:
Over at WebSound we're always striving to meet the requirements of our clients, we've been offering affordable, reliable hosting solutions for over 2 years, and we're always listening to feedback in order to improve. WebSound are a registered company in the UK, and we're also registered under the EU VAT MOSS Scheme (VAT No: GB 203 0289 55).


We know our clients want access to high performnace, affordable services which make use of the latest technologies, we're therefore pleased to announce the launch of our new Premium KVM SSD VPS servers. These VPS servers are fantastic, and that's why they're Premium! We've based these VPS on Intel E3 Processors with 4 Samsung SSD Drives in an LSI RAID 10 array to offer you disk transfer speeds of up to 1GB/s, not only that, these nodes are packed with only 32GB of RAM, meaning that you'll have a very small number of other VPS sharing the same node as your VPS, compared to other VPS ranges which can have up to 128GB RAM per node. These new VPS are absolutely fantastic, and would be great for performance necessary services, such as game servers or large database driven websites, so to top it off, we're throwing in DDoS Protection of up to 10Gbps/10Mpps, absolutely free! These VPS are currently available in Los Angeles, with additional locations lined up for the future.


KVMSP256 Package:
256mb RAM
